title: Does Satan have the ability to help Satan worshippers? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: he says that there are people who worship satan individuals organizations so does satan have the ability to assist them do things worldly for them the answer is yes and we know that this is explained in the quran that some of the humans may use and utilize some of the jinn so they worship them and the jinn may enslave them yet do favors for them such as getting them money or making their enemies sick or this or that but this comes at a price which is losing the dunya and losing the hereafter as well
